name: mutation-report-publisher
description: With this extension you add the mutation report to your build summary so you can view the mutation test result on azure devops.
author: Rouke Broersma

scripts.package: lerna run compile && tfx extension create --manifest-globs ./extension/azure-devops-extension.json
scripts.package:dev: lerna run compile:dev && tfx extension create --manifest-globs ./extension/azure-devops-extension.json --overrides-file ./extension/azure-devops-extension-patch.dev.json
